title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, MFA Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience Participants of Syndicate Four (4) of the Executive Intelligence Management Course 16 of the National Institute for Security Studies, ( NISS).

content.rendered:
Today, 21st July, 2023, the Permanent Secretary, MFA Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa received in audience Participants of Syndicate Four (4) of the Executive Intelligence Management Course 16 of the National Institute for Security Studies, ( NISS), Usuma Dam, Bwari. The Participants were led by Mr. Said O. Yusuf.

Discussions centered on matters relating to Nigeria’s Foreign Policy.
